meanings.definition: To allow or enable to escape or go: to release a prisoner.
To free from confinement, bondage, obligation, pain, etc.; let go: to release a prisoner; to release someone from a debt.
To allow to be known, issued, done, or exhibited: to release an article for publication.
To give up, relinquish, or surrender: to release an claim.
To set free from restraint, confinement, or servitude: to release a captive.
